definition: to lose blood from one's body
details:
verb
- to lose blood from one's body
= example: to lose blood from one's body
= synonyms: hemorrhage
- to draw blood
= example: to draw blood
= synonyms: leech
- to drain off liquid or steam
= example: to drain off liquid or steam
- to be diffused
= example: to be diffused
= synonyms: run
- to get or extort money or other possessions from someone
= example: to get or extort money or other possessions from someone
